attributes.action: Rememberance day to be recognised as/have a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details:
I was at work this past rememberance day. And was told we would recognize a 2mins silence to remember. 
I find it shameful that for all these people sacrificed for us, they get 2 minutes. 
The least they deserve is a day, so we can have street parties, tie yellow ribbons round our trees and make the most fabulous poppy displays possible. 
Because that really is, the very least, that these hero's deserve.
attributes.background:
I'd love to see a recognised bank holiday to remember our troops. 
So we can all take a day to celebrate and commemorate our hero's and all they sacrificed for us.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open on this topic, which you may like to sign:

Make the day after Remembrance Sunday a Public Holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601262

Create a Bank Holiday in memory of armed services personnel killed in service
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588315
